dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
[private] 
Cheshire,
UK
Tel: (UK)[private] 

Email:
[private] @gmail.com
[private] @gmail.com

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, Blogger DMCA Complaints
[private] 
Mountain View, CA [private] 

11th September 2007

Dear Sirs,

Thank you for your email, received today, in response to my letter of 25th August 2007 re the hosting of copyright material on moth2fic.blogspot.com.  I hope the following information will be sufficient for you to identify the material in question.

Section 1. Copyrighted work infringed.
a. http://moth2fic.livejournal.com/13754.html
The entire post is the draft first chapter of a novel- intended for submission for publication.
b. http://moth2fic.livejournal.com/12759.html
The post contains a political 'speech' commenting on a game - the original 'speech' was reposted by me at the request of the writer.
c. http://moth2fic.livejournal.com/13251.html
The entire post deals with the writing and posting of the drafts of the novel chapters.
d. http://moth2fic.livejournal.com/10076.html
The entire post is a book review, intended for submission to a magazine.
As I explained in my initial letter, the journal is 'locked' and you will only be able to look at it by contacting LiveJournal who will assist you in bypassing the locks.  I have informed them of the position.

.....continued
[page 2]
Section 2. Infringing material.
a. http://moth2fic.blogspot.com/2006/08/watch-out-for-is-that-arent-pleasethe.html
This is a direct copy of 1.a.above
b. http://moth2fic.blogspot.com/2006/08/i-dont-often-post-here-unless-ive.html
This is a direct copy of 1.b. above.
c. http://moth2fic.blogspot.com/2006/08/i-have-this-winnie-pooh-poster-on-my.html
This is a direct copy of 1.c. above
d. http://moth2fic.blogspot.com/2006/08/decided-to-keep-all-review-to-this.html
This is a direct copy of 1.d. above.

Not only does the material infringe my copyright but the user has also chosen to use my LiveJournal username so that this shows in Google searches as 'my' work, which would therefore count as 'prior publication' if I submitted the work to a publisher.  I not that the blog, whilst still in existence, no longer shows in a search and assume you have removed it from searh engines until the matter is resolved.

Section 3. Contact information.

My email address and my home address are given at the head of this letter.  My main email address is: [private] @gmail.com

Section 4. Statement:
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringed web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Section 4. Statement:
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

I am the copyright owner of all the material in Section 1 with the exception of the reposted speech in 1.b.

Yours faithfully,
Elizabeth M. Nicholson. LL.B
